nodes.text: Lex Lang (born November 12, 1965) is an American voice actor and director who voiced Han Solo in the games Star Wars: Battlefront II and Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike. He is the official "audio double" for the character played by Harrison Ford. He was also "Stormtrooper 1" in The Force Unleashed and Poe Dameron in LEGO Star Wars: The Resistance Rises. He provided additional voices in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, and also voiced Rygog and Lerigot in Power Rangers Turbo and Ecliptor in Power Rangers in Space.
